mods.abstract: This file contains correspondence sent between British officials in the India relating to their reactions to an article, 'Why this army in the East?', which was written by Henry Noel Brailsford and published by the British newspaper Reynolds News.The main correspondents are Roland Tennyson Peel (Assistant Secretary for Political (External) Department) and Edward Walter Fletcher (Deputy Secretary for the External Affairs Department).
